page.title: Stocks Rise After Fed Hikes Rates
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks extended their gains slightly before stabilizing on Tuesday, after the Federal Reserve hiked interest rates by an expected quarter-point, while technology stocks were sparked by a report that Veritas Software Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=VRTS.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">VRTS.O</A> would be taken over.
